result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: MCJ with 60 days to start & NO days credit. Transfer of jail to Lincoln County is authroized if approved by sheriffs.

records.addlTxt:
Clerk Marisa.
Case Called: 10:16 am 
INCLUDES 21CM783, 21CT107, 21CT171, & 21CT367. 
State appears by ADA Kerri Puig; Def appears in person with Atty Wright Laufenberg. 
Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights filed. 
State notes motion to amend criminal complaint in 21CT171. 
No objection to motion. 
COURT accepts amended criminal complaint. 
State to e-file information once new felony number is assigned for charges in 21CT171. 

State moves to: 
In 21CM783: Cts. 1 - 3>>D&RI. 
In 21CT107: Ct. 1>>D&RI. 
In 21CT171: Ct. 3>>D&RI. 
In 21CT367: Ct. 1>>D&RI. 
COURT grants above. 

PLEA: 
In 21CT171: Ct. 1 (Possession with Intent to Deliver - Methamphetamine)>>NO CONTEST. 
                    : Ct. 2 (OWI 2nd)>>NO CONTEST. 

COURT advises def of rights (including constitutional rights) & penalties & ques def to understanding.  
COURT finds plea & waiver of rights freely & vol made,a factual basis, & def guilty but defers entry of judgment on Ct. 1. 

COURT ORDERS: 
In 21CT171: Ct. 1>>DEOJ for 3 yrs with conditions as outlined in written agreement - upon successfully completion of DEOJ agreement, this charge to be DISMISSED. 
                    : Ct. 2>>$1429 inclusive with 60 days to pay or set up payment plan; DNA sample; 5 days MCJ with 60 days to start & NO days credit - transfer of jail to Lincoln County is authorized if approved by sheriffs; 12 months dl revocation with admin credit; 12 months IID; Alcohol; 6 pts against dl. 
DEOJ Review set for April 25, 2025 at 10:45 am with JA. 
Adj: 10:30 am
w/Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief
